t: Amazon Pantry is being discontinued as Amazon consolidates its grocery delivery services
s: January 8, 2021 - Amazon would later slightly change up how Prime Pantry worked in 2018, shifting the service to a $5 per month subscription on top of its regular Prime fees. That price would offer unlimited Pantry orders each month, provided that customers were ordering at least $40 worth of merchandise.
